SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/Dev8dTalks/Clojure 

Clojure Lab

Lab description
Code developed at the Clojure lab

Coljure Dojo

Define a function

(defn dbl[x] (* 2 x))

Average of two numbers:
(defn avg[x y] (/ (+ x y) z))

(defn guess[x]
    (if (goodenough? x)
        x
        (guess (impr x))))
        
(defn iterativeImprove[x goodenough? improve]
    (if (goodenough? x)
        x
        (iterativeImprove (improve x))))
        
Raiz cuadradas con otros dígitos

(defn multiplier[x] 
    (fn[y] // defino una funcion que solo utilizo aquí dentro
        (* y x)))
((multipier 3)5) = 15

(defn impr[x](avg x (/ 10 x)))

(defn makeimpr[target]
    (fn[x]
        (avg x (/ target x))))
        
(defn makegoodenough [epsilon]
    (fn[x]
        (< (abs (- 10 (* x x) )) epsilon)))
        
(defn makegoodenough [target epsilon]
    (fn[x]
        (< (abs (- target (* x x) )) epsilon)))
((makegoodenough 9 1/10000) 3.0)

(defn iterativeimprove[x goodenough? improve]
    (if (goodenough? x)
        x
        (iterativeimprove (improve x) goodenough? improve)))
        
        
function that gives back the square of n

(defn sqrt[target]
    (iterativeimprove target (makegoodenough target 1/10000000)
        (makeimpr target)))
(sqrt 9.0)
speaker: SYSTEM
